item.battlecorrection.enemy_staff.toolti: Right-click two mobs to make them attack each other
item.battlecorrection.rebel_staff.toolti: Right-click a mob to make all nearby mobs attack it
item.battlecorrection.riot_staff.tooltip: Right-click a mob to make it attack random nearby mobs (lasting effect)
item.battlecorrection.brawl_staff.toolti: Right-click to make all nearby mobs attack each other
Right-click to make mobs of different species attack each other
Right-click a mob to instantly kill it
item.battlecorrection.range_sacrificial_: Right-click a mob to instantly kill all non-player entities nearby
item.battlecorrection.healing_staff.tool: Right-click a mob to fully restore its health
item.battlecorrection.range_healing_staf: Right-click a mob to fully restore health of all nearby entities
Right-click a mob to remove all potion effects
message.battlecorrection.select_first: First target selected, right-click another mob
message.battlecorrection.select_second: Both targets are now hostile to each other!
config.battlecorrection.title: Battle Correction Config
config.battlecorrection.pvp.tooltip:
Controls the damage dealt between players in PVP combat.
§70.5§r = 50% damage
§71.0§r = Normal damage (default)
§72.0§r = 200% damage
§70.0§r = Disable PVP completely
config.battlecorrection.pvpHurtItself.to:
Controls damage when a player hurts themselves.
Includes: TNT, splash potions, thorns, ender pearls, etc.
§70.0§r = Prevent all self-damage
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
When enabled, uncharged attacks deal reduced damage.
Discourages spam-clicking and rewards timing.
§7true§r = Uncharged attacks deal less damage
§7false§r = All attacks deal full damage (default)
config.battlecorrection.attackCooldown.t:
Toggle the 1.9+ attack cooldown system.
§7true§r = 1.9+ combat with cooldown (default)
§7false§r = 1.8 combat with no cooldown
config.battlecorrection.hurtTimeEntity.t:
Adjusts invulnerability frames after an entity takes damage.
Formula: §eNew Time = Original × (1 + Value)§r
§7-0.5§r = Half duration (faster attacks)
§70.0§r = Normal (default)
§71.0§r = Double duration (slower attacks)
config.battlecorrection.hurtTimePlayer.t:
Adjusts invulnerability frames after a player takes damage.
Formula: §eNew Time = Original × (1 + Value)§r
§7-0.5§r = Half duration (more vulnerable)
§70.0§r = Normal (default)
§71.0§r = Double duration (more tanky)
config.battlecorrection.playerMeleeAttac:
Multiplier for all melee damage dealt by players.
Affects: swords, axes, fists, and other direct attacks.
§70.5§r = 50% damage
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
§72.0§r = 200% damage
config.battlecorrection.playerArrowAttac:
Multiplier for arrow damage dealt by players.
Affects: bows, crossbows, and all arrow projectiles.
§70.5§r = 50% damage
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
§72.0§r = 200% damage
config.battlecorrection.playerProjectile:
Multiplier for non-arrow projectile damage.
Affects: tridents, snowballs, eggs, modded projectiles.
Does NOT include arrows or magic damage.
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
config.battlecorrection.playerMagicAttac:
Multiplier for magic damage dealt by players.
Affects: instant damage potions, thorns, guardian beams.
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
config.battlecorrection.playerSuffersMel:
Multiplier for melee damage received by players.
§70.5§r = Take 50% damage (more resistant)
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
§72.0§r = Take 200% damage (more vulnerable)
config.battlecorrection.playerSuffersArr:
Multiplier for arrow damage received by players.
§70.5§r = Take 50% damage (more resistant)
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
config.battlecorrection.playerSuffersPro:
Multiplier for non-arrow projectile damage received.
§70.5§r = Take 50% damage (more resistant)
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
config.battlecorrection.playerSuffersMag:
Multiplier for magic damage received by players.
§70.5§r = Take 50% damage (more resistant)
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
config.battlecorrection.extraMaxHealth.t:
Adjusts maximum health of non-player entities.
Formula: §eNew Health = Original × (1 + Value)§r
§7-0.5§r = 50% health (weaker mobs)
§70.0§r = Normal (default)
§71.0§r = 200% health (stronger mobs)
§cNote: Does not affect players!§r
config.battlecorrection.extraSaturationH:
Extra flat health restored per tick when regenerating from saturation.
Requires: Saturation > 0 AND Hunger ≥ 18
§70.5§r = +0.5 HP per tick
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
config.battlecorrection.extraSaturationP:
Extra health restored as percentage of max health per tick.
Requires: Saturation > 0 AND Hunger ≥ 18
§70.05§r = Restore 5% of max health per tick
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
Extra flat health restored per tick when Hunger ≥ 18.
Works regardless of saturation level.
§70.5§r = +0.5 HP per tick
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
config.battlecorrection.extraHungerPerce:
Extra health restored as percentage of max health per tick.
Requires: Hunger ≥ 18 (saturation not required)
§70.05§r = Restore 5% of max health per tick
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
config.battlecorrection.hungerDamageDeca:
Reduces damage dealt based on missing hunger points.
Formula: §ePenalty = (20 - Hunger) × Value§r
§70.05§r = 5% less damage per missing hunger point
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
At 0 hunger with 0.05: 100% penalty (capped by limit)

Maximum damage reduction from hunger decay.
Prevents complete damage negation.
§70.7§r = Max 70% damage reduction
§70.0§r = No limit (default)
config.battlecorrection.magicDamage.tool:
Flat bonus damage added to all magic attacks.
Affects: instant damage potions, witch attacks, etc.
§75§r = +5 damage to all magic attacks
§70§r = No bonus (default)
config.battlecorrection.arrowDamage.tool:
Flat bonus damage added to all arrow attacks.
Affects: bows, crossbows, skeleton arrows, etc.
§75§r = +5 damage to all arrow attacks
§70§r = No bonus (default)
config.battlecorrection.projectileDamage:
Flat bonus damage for non-arrow projectiles.
Affects: tridents, bullets from weapon mods, etc.
Does NOT affect arrows or magic.
§75§r = +5 damage
§70§r = No bonus (default)
config.battlecorrection.restoreHeal.tool:
Multiplier for all healing received.
Affects: natural regen, potions, golden apples, etc.
§70.5§r = 50% healing (reduced)
§71.0§r = Normal (default)
§72.0§r = 200% healing (doubled)
config.battlecorrection.bloodthirsty.too:
Restore health based on melee damage dealt.
§cRequires full attack charge to trigger!§r
§70.2§r = Restore 20% of damage as health
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
Example: Deal 10 damage → Heal 2 HP
config.battlecorrection.almightyBloodthi:
Restore health based on ALL damage dealt.
Works with: melee, arrows, projectiles, magic.
§cMelee still requires full attack charge!§r
§70.2§r = Restore 20% of all damage as health
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
config.battlecorrection.immuneDamage.too:
Percentage chance to completely dodge an attack.
Range: 0-100%
§725§r = 25% chance to dodge
§70§r = Never dodge (default)
§cDoes not work against unblockable damage!§r
config.battlecorrection.ignoreDamage.too:
Flat damage blocked from all sources.
If damage ≤ reduction: completely blocked
If damage > reduction: reduced by this amount
§75§r = Block/reduce 5 damage
§70§r = No reduction (default)
§cDoes not work against unblockable damage!§r
config.battlecorrection.reducedFallDamag:
Flat fall damage reduction.
MC fall damage ≈ 1 damage per block after 3 blocks.
§710§r = Ignore ~13 blocks of fall damage
§70§r = No reduction (default)
config.battlecorrection.bowSpeed.tooltip:
Multiplier for bow/crossbow drawing speed.
Affects how fast you can fully charge a bow.
§71.0§r = Normal speed (default)
§72.0§r = Draw twice as fast
§70.5§r = Draw at half speed
config.battlecorrection.preparationSpeed:
Multiplier for item use speed.
Affects: eating food, drinking potions, raising shields.
Does NOT affect bows (use Bow Speed instead).
§71.0§r = Normal speed (default)
§72.0§r = Use items twice as fast
config.battlecorrection.jumpLift.tooltip:
Extra jump height in blocks.
Uses vanilla jump boost formula.
§70.1§r ≈ +1 block jump height
§70.0§r = Normal jump (default)
config.battlecorrection.vanillaCriticalH:
Bonus damage for vanilla critical hits (falling attack).
Formula: §eDamage × (1 + Value)§r
§70.5§r = 150% damage (vanilla default)
§71.0§r = 200% damage
§cOnly affects jump-attack crits!§r
config.battlecorrection.customCriticalCh:
Chance to land a custom critical hit.
Range: 0.0 to ∞ (supports overflow)
§70.5§r = 50% crit chance
§71.0§r = 100% crit chance
§71.5§r = 100% crit + 0.5 overflow → extra damage
§70.0§r = Disabled (default)
config.battlecorrection.customCriticalDa:
Damage multiplier when custom crit triggers.
Minimum value: 1.0
§72.0§r = 200% damage on crit (recommended)
§73.0§r = 300% damage on crit
config.battlecorrection.criticalOverflow:
Converts overflow crit chance into bonus crit damage.
Formula: §eBonus = Overflow × Conversion§r
Example with 150% crit chance and 1.0 conversion:
→ 100% crit + (0.5 × 1.0) = +0.5 crit damage
§71.0§r = 100% conversion (default)
config.battlecorrection.enableDetailedLo:
Outputs detailed debug information to the log.
Includes: damage calculations, attribute values,
critical hits, healing amounts, event triggers.
§c⚠ WARNING: Generates MASSIVE log output!§r
§cOnly enable for debugging purposes!§r
